mapper.select: /* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_fat_judg_spec.select */ SELECT curr_fat_judg_cd /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,prdt_fat_judg_cd /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,prdt_eval_smry /* prdt_eval_smry 예측_평가_요약 character varying(1000) */ ,prdt_eval_cntn /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ FROM ti_fat_judg_spec WHERE 1 = 1 AND curr_fat_judg_cd = #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ AND prdt_fat_judg_cd = #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_fat_judg_spec.insert */ INSERT INTO ti_fat_judg_spec ( curr_fat_judg_cd /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,prdt_fat_judg_cd /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,prdt_eval_smry /* prdt_eval_smry 예측_평가_요약 character varying(1000) */
,prdt_eval_cntn /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
) VALUES ( #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
,#{prdtEvalSmry} /* prdt_eval_smry 예측_평가_요약 character varying(1000) */
,#{prdtEvalCntn} /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */
,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
)
mapper.update:
/* Generated SQL SQL ID : ti_fat_judg_spec.update */ UPDATE ti_fat_judg_spec
,prdt_eval_smry = #{prdtEvalSmry} /* prdt_eval_smry 예측_평가_요약 character varying(1000) */
,prdt_eval_cntn = #{prdtEvalCntn} /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */
,upt_dt = to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */
,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND curr_fat_judg_cd = #{currFatJudgCd} /* curr_fat_judg_cd 현재_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ AND prdt_fat_judg_cd = #{prdtFatJudgCd} /* prdt_fat_judg_cd 예측_비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */

,to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,to_char(now(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */

) ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE
